GOVERNMENT OF INDIA 
‘A’  WING , JANPATH  BHAWAN , 
JANPATH, NEW DELHI -110001 
Date : 30.08.2007 
 
 
CIRCULAR NO. 08/2007 
 
 
In Suppression of this Bureau  Circular No. 07/2005 dated 15.02.2005, the Personal 
Security Officers (PSOs) of Shri L.K. Advani, Leader of Opposition (Lok Sabha), are permitted 
to carry their weapons and ammunitions on their persons or in their hand baggage “on board 
domestic flights”.  The weapons will be carried in fully unloaded condition i.e. weapons and 
ammunition shall be kept separately while accompanying the dignitary on board the aircraft “.  
 
 
 
 
( M.Malaviya) 
Addl. Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
Distribution : As per standard list
